text.more:
Ego co-occurrence network for mask actant (black node).

Top 50 highest scoring nodes by degree score. 

Degree threshold set at 1923, amounting to network consisting of 50 nodes.

Time period 2 of 2019 Hong Kong Protests: 2019-09-24 – 2019-10-24.

For analytical interpretations of network, please refer to my paper: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1MsaPFXUeouSw_B44d7Jwbaq8o1KxVLsX/view?usp=sharing

text.title: Ego network for mask actant. Time period 2 of 2019 Hong Kong Protests.
